## DEFAULT\_TOC\_PARAMETERS variable

The default [TocParameters](./toc.tocparameters.md) for `toc` action

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEFAULT_TOC_PARAMETERS: {
    id: string;
    selector: string;
    ignore: string[];
    scrollMarginTop: number;
    anchor: {
        enabled: true;
        content: string;
        position: "prepend";
        properties: {
            'aria-hidden': string;
            tabindex: string;
        };
        href: (slug: string) => string;
    };
    observe: {
        enabled: false;
        strategy: "auto";
        threshold: (element: HTMLElement) => number;
    };
}
```
